name: PINKFONG! Surprise Eggs
description: [PINKFONG! Surprise Eggs] for kids between the ages 0 and 3. [PINKFONG! Surprise Eggs] is an interactive app filled with surprise eggs kids can tap on to find out whats inside.  Tap on eggs to collect a variety of surprise toys such as princesses, dinosaurs, cars and robots. Have fun exploring hidden interactive activities.  - Tap on eggs to unwarp them. - A variety of little toys will surprise you. - You can revisit your toys in your collection.  This app is packed with various eggs and surprise toys kids can play with everyday.  *Enjoy everything for free.
